title: Definitive list of font weights
content:
Hello typophilers,   
   
Is there such a thing as a definitive list of font weights? You know the sort of thing - hairline through to ultra black. I have been writing my own and it's growing very large but I am getting the feeling that I am missing out on a lot of them.   
   
Regards   
PAUL
author: skyrocket

comments.content: Sounds interesting, Paul. I hope you post your list.

"Do you think this SemiBold makes me look fat?"   
(But not if it's renamed Medium.)
